entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failure in CSharpOperationFactory when encountering invalid LINQ query syntax #70329
  • EditorConfig GUI editor doesn't work for anything else than files named .editorconfig and in specific locations #70326
  • "Cannot navigate to the symbol" message box after successfully opening definition #70323
  • Missing error for interceptors for dynamic calls #70321
  • Overload resolution prefers Span<T> over ReadOnlySpan<T> for collection expression #70318
    17.8
  • Interceptor for non-existing methods? #70317
  • Pull method up to interface doesn't show interface name when method name is too long (matters when multiple interfaces) #70316
  • Inline hints should cache and reuse measurement data #70315
  • Visual Studio C# text editor indentation for "else switch" #70314
  • Callbacks into DocumentDiagnosticAnalyzer should be determined by DiagnosticAnalyzerCategory #70312
  • False erorrs with generic interceptors #70311
  • Interceptors do not report nullability warnings when type parameter constraints are not satisfied #70310

Closed

  • An exception is thrown when getting the compilation. #66556
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34210.145 #70327
  • Is it possible to use MSBuildWorkspace on a device without MSBuild.exe? #70313
  • C# doesn't allow for methods with optional `System.Half` parameters #70300

PullRequests

Created

  • Change Blazor template group name for newer templates #70330
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #70328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • In most cases, remove the camel case matching for case sensitive matches #70324
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Fix regression that caused us to sync data unnecessarily. #70320
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations in CreateCompilationTrackerMap #70319
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include sqlite binaries to enable persistent storage in vscode #70162
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Replace Roslyn.Utilities.IReadOnlySet with System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlySet #70297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Unskip working tests #70266
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
